articles.description: THE BBC has sparked a furious reaction from licence-fee payers as Christmas programmes that promised 'a wealth of festive sparkle' looks awfully familiar to the lineup seen last year.

articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
articles.title: Turnip Prize 2021: 'Panda Mick' wins spoof art award - BBC News
articles.description: This year's parody of the world-famous Turner Prize is awarded to bad artwork aimed at Covid-19.
articles.content:
Image source, Turnip Prize
Image caption, The award is given to the entry created with "the least amount of effort"
A soft toy entitled "Panda Mick" has won the annual spoof Turnip Prize competitio… [+1945 chars]

articles.title: Harry Potter 20th Anniversary: Reunion special with Daniel Radcliffe and Emma Watson coming to Sky on New Year's Day - Sky News
